results.name: a(n) = sigma(n)*sigma(n+1)/gcd(sigma(n+1), sigma(n))^2.
comment: a(n) = A060781(n)/A060780(n) = A083539(n)/A060780(n)^2; quotient when lcm(sigma(n+1), sigma(n)) is divided by gcd(sigma(n+1), sigma(n)).
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[x_] := DivisorSigma[1, x] t=Table[LCM[f[w+1], f[w]]/GCD[f[w+1], f[w]], {w, 1, 128}]
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(x=sigma(n),y=sigma(n+1)); x*y/gcd(x,y)^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 09 2014
